titles: Some observations upon the Answer to an enquiry into the grounds & occasions of the contempt of the clergy, with some additions in a second letter to R. L. / by the same author.
author: Eachard, John, 1636?-1697.
notes: The "Answer" was written by John Bramhall, Abp. of Armagh.
Attributed to John Eachard, the author of The grounds and occasions of the contempt of the clergy.  Cf. McAlpin Coll.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
keywords: Bramhall, John, 1594-1663. --  Answer to a letter of enquiry into the grounds and occasions of the contempt of the clergy.
Eachard, John, 1636?-1697. --  Grounds & occasions of the contempt of the clergy and religion enquired into.
